\doublespacing


\newcommand{\acronym}[2]{
	\newboolean{acronym#1}
	\setboolean{acronym#1}{true}
	\expandafter\newcommand\expandafter{\csname acronym#1\endcsname}{#2}
}
\newcommand{\printlongacronym}[2]{\unskip #2 (#1)\ignorespaces}
\newcommand{\printshortacronym}[1]{\unskip #1\ignorespaces}
\newcommand{\ac}[1]{
	\ifthenelse{\boolean{acronym#1}}%
	{\ignorespaces\printlongacronym{#1}{\csname%
			acronym#1\endcsname}\ignorespaces%
		\setboolean{acronym#1}{false}\ignorespaces}%
	{\ignorespaces\printshortacronym{#1}}
}

\acronym{TPM}{Trusted Platform Module}
\acronym{PUF}{Physically Unclonable Function}
\newcommand{\puf}{\ac{PUF}}
\newcommand{\tpm}{\ac{TPM}}

\usepackage[unicode=true,
 bookmarks=true,bookmarksnumbered=false,bookmarksopen=false,
 breaklinks=false,pdfborder={0 0 0},backref=false,colorlinks=false]
 {hyperref}
\hypersetup{pdftitle={Intellectual Property protection Mechanism adopting new low-cost hardware techniques},
 pdfauthor={Domenico Amelino}}
\usepackage{breakurl}

\makeatletter

\sloppy

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.

\AtBeginDocument{\providecommand\figref[1]{\ref{fig:#1}}}
\AtBeginDocument{\providecommand\subref[1]{\ref{sub:#1}}}
%% A simple dot to overcome graphicx limitations
\newcommand{\lyxdot}{.}
\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.3}
\newcommand{\xor}{\mathbin{\oplus}}

\RS@ifundefined{subref}
  {\def\RSsubtxt{section~}\newref{sub}{name = \RSsubtxt}}
  {}
\RS@ifundefined{thmref}
  {\def\RSthmtxt{theorem~}\newref{thm}{name = \RSthmtxt}}
  {}
\RS@ifundefined{lemref}
  {\def\RSlemtxt{lemma~}\newref{lem}{name = \RSlemtxt}}
  {}


\renewenvironment{figure}[1][]{%
  \def\@captype{figure}%
  \par\nobreak\begin{center}\nobreak}
  {\par\nobreak\end{center}}
  

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
\numberwithin{equation}{section}
\numberwithin{figure}{section}

\@ifundefined{date}{}{\date{}}

% SFONDO
% ----------

\usepackage{eso-pic,graphicx}
\makeatletter
\newcommand\BackgroundPicture[2]{
\setlength{\unitlength}{1pt}
\put(0,\strip@pt\paperheight){
\parbox[t][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{
\vfill
\centering\includegraphics[angle=#2]{#1}
\vfill
}
}
}
\makeatother

% -----------------
\usepackage[titletoc]{appendix}


%per i codici
%-----

%\usepackage[hang,small,bf]{caption}
\usepackage{listings,xcolor,courier}

\definecolor{Maroon}{rgb}{0.5,0,0}
\definecolor{darkgreen}{rgb}{0,0.5,0}

\lstdefinelanguage{XML_android}
{
    alsoletter=-,
    basicstyle=\ttfamily\footnotesize,
    morestring=[b]",
    moredelim=*[s][\color{Maroon}]{<}{\ },
    moredelim=[s][\color{Maroon}]{</}{>},
    moredelim=[l][\color{Maroon}]{/>},
    moredelim=[l][\color{Maroon}]{>},
    morecomment=[s]{<?}{?>},
    morecomment=[s]{<!--}{-->},
    morecomment=[s]{<!}{>},
    commentstyle=\color{darkgreen},
    stringstyle=\color{blue},
    identifierstyle=\color{red}
}

\lstdefinelanguage{XML_SYNTAX}{%
    morekeywords={id},
    alsoletter=-,
    morestring=[b]",
    stringstyle=\color[rgb]{0,0,1},
    morecomment=[s]{<?}{?>},
    morecomment=[s]{<!--}{-->},
    morecomment=[s]{<!}{>},
    commentstyle=\color{darkgreen},
    moredelim=[s][\color{black}]{![}{]]},
    moredelim=*[s][\color{Maroon}]{<}{>},
    keywordstyle=\color{red}
}

\lstset{
    % Basic design
    backgroundcolor=\color[rgb]{1.0,1.0,1.0},
    basicstyle=\tiny,
    breaklines=true,
    frame=l,
    tabsize=1,
    % Line numbers
    xleftmargin={0.25cm},
    numbers=left,
    stepnumber=1,
    firstnumber=1,
    numberfirstline=true,
    % HTML formatting
    language=XML_SYNTAX,
}

\lstset{inputpath=capitolo4/}
